body:
On Monday, May 28th, 2018 at 5:30 pm PST (see all timezones here), we’re scheduling downtime for approximately 1-hour to upgrade our database. To ensure stability of the platform and transition smoothly, we’re performing this upgrade on our infrastructure during a time that least impacts our customers globally.

During this time, the HackerRank platform will be inaccessible, and all operations around the platform will resume immediately after the maintenance window. 

How does this impact candidates?

The test interface will not be available during the maintenance window. If candidates try to launch a test, they’ll see a notification asking them to come back at a later time. We will also ensure that candidates will only be able to start their test if they can complete it before the start of the maintenance window. 

How does this impact CodePair sessions?

New CodePair sessions cannot begin during the maintenance window. Also, candidates cannot begin CodePair sessions up to 90 minutes prior to the start of the window. If a CodePair session happens to be in progress as we approach the planned downtime, we’ll display warning messages so candidates can complete their interviews in a timely manner. Interview data recorded before the maintenance window starts will be stored safely. 

How does this impact my reports?

You will not be able to view reports or dashboards during the downtime. 

What happens to invites expiring on Monday, May 28th?

For candidate test invites that expire on May 28th, you can change the test expiration date and we would be happy to help with this. 

The Support and Customer Success team is also standing by to help you in any way we can. Please feel free to reach out to us by emailing support@hackerrank.com or via support.hackerrank.com.

You can also check status updates here. 

Thank you for your patience and continued support.
title: Maintenance: 5-28-18
